name: Awooo~
description:
While playing hide and seek in the bamboo forest, Sakuya has accidentally released the most terrible of curses. Help her restore her dignity!

Made in 72 hours for the Touhou Fan Game Jam. Unfortunately couldn't be submitted in time because of DLL hell problems.

No sound - sorry!
Default controls:
- Arrow keys - move and attack in four directions
- Space - rest - resting a few times in a row will heal you
- Enter - stop time - to get out of a sticky situation

This game is a derivative work (loosely) based on the Touhou Project by ZUN/Team Shanghai Alice.
            
CREDITS
Code: Niektóry
Art: Nanako Shu

Kudos to the FIFE developers for the engine
